titleStmt.title: Korpus Dyskursu Parlamentarnego ParlaMint-PL [ParlaMint]
Polish parliamentary corpus ParlaMint-PL [ParlaMint]
Sprawozdania stenograficzne Sejmu i Senatu RP (2015-2022)
Minutes of the Sejm and Senat of the Republic of Poland (2015-2022)

Data retrieval and conversion to TEI

bibl.title: Sprawozdanie stenograficzne z obrad Sejmu RP
Minutes of the Sejm of the Republic of Poland
Sprawozdanie stenograficzne z obrad Senatu RP
Minutes of the Senat of the Republic of Poland

projectDesc.p: ParlaMint is a project that aims to (1) create a multilingual set of comparable corpora of parliamentary proceedings uniformly encoded according to the ParlaMint encoding guidelines, covering the period from 2015 to mid-2022; (2) add linguistic annotations to the corpora and machine-translate them to English; (3) make the corpora available through concordancers; and (4) build use cases in Political Sciences and Digital Humanities based on the corpus data.

correction.p: No correction of source texts was performed.

normalization.p: Text has not been normalised, except for spacing.

hyphenation.p: No end-of-line hyphens were present in the source.

quotation.p: Quotation marks have been left in the text and are not explicitly marked up.

segmentation.p: The texts are segmented into utterances (speeches) and segments (corresponding to paragraphs in the source transcription).

revisionDesc.change: parlamint2release script: Fix some identifiable erros for the release.
Michał Rudolf: Generated corpus in Parla-CLARIN.
